NAME: CPSC Req

NAME: ECON Elec

NAME: AFAM Req
requirements: AFAM 160, AFAM 162, AFAM 410, AFAM 480, AFAM 491; AFAM num (where num[skill] == HU) * 1; AFAM num (where num[skill] == SO) * 1;

NAME: EP&E Req

NAME: Classics BA
requirements: "GREK 403 or LATN 390; LATN num (where num > 300) * 6; GREK num (where num > 300) * 4;"

NAME: NEURO req

column8: CPSC 100 or CPSC 112; MATH 112 or 115; NSCI 340

NAME: PHIL BA

NAME: CHEM req

NAME: CHEM BS

NAME: CPAR BS

NAME: LING BA
column4: LING 490; LING num (where num > 200) * 1; LING num (where num > 100) * 7; LING 491;"

NAME: MATH req
